author: Ben Kesslen
title: Vacation towns to seasonal residents: Stay away
description: Permanent residents of vacation towns and areas like Martha's Vineyard, Lake Tahoe and the Hamptons have a message for their seasonal residents: Stay away.
content: Such scenes have been replicated across the country. In South Lake Tahoe, California, the mayor told visitors to stay away. In the Hamptons on Long Island, some New Yorkers tried to heat their pools as markets ran out of food because they didn't anticipate so… [+5511 chars]
